task.name: h_save
task.shortdescription: Save the pipeline state to disk
task.description: h_save saves the current pipeline state to disk using a unique filename. If no name is supplied one is generated automatically from a combination of the root name, 'context', the current stage number, and a time stamp.

param.name: filename
param.description: Name of the saved pipeline state. If filename is '' then a unique name will be generated computed several components: the root, 'context', the current stage number, and the time stamp.

task.example:
1. Save the current state in the default file
h_save()
2. Save the current state to a file called 'savestate_1'
h_save(filename='savestate_1')
